author: senh
title: Readers Recommend Where to Go Around Lake Michigan
text: BING NEWS: Readers Recommend Where to Go Around Lake Michigan One of our recent articles, “A Tour of Lake Michigan, My Inland Sea,” about the writer Rich Cohen’s travels around the lake, inspired more than 290 comments on nytimes.com/travel. Mr. Cohen, who grew up in Glencoe, Ill., about a mile from the shore ... 09/1/2015 - 9:15 am | View Link Sounding Off: Dallas County readers discuss neighborhood safety This group will be present at Joe Pool Lake and Lynn Creek Park on Labor Day weekend ... I have attended the Duncanville Citizen Police Academy twice and highly recommend it to residents to help them get to know our police officers personally and learn ... 08/28/2015 - 4:52 am | View Link Maine summers are magical for BDN readers I grew up on Portage Lake during the late ’60s and early ’70s ... we recently tried the “Come Boating” adventure in Belfast Harbor … and we highly recommend it! We are looking forward to a zip-line adventure soon.
